name: Grog Incentive
description:
In this Roguelike Action game, you will play as an "Oversized sword"-wielding pirate in search of a long lost treasure.

Controls:

  • Move with WASD
  • Attack with LMB (Left Click)
  • Interact with E
  • Dash with RMB (Right Click)

Game Flow:

The object of the game is to eliminate all the enemies in the current level.  Once this task is completed, a Mysterious Crystal will appear, which you can interact with to be transported to the next level.  Before the next level is loaded, you will have the ability to choose a card (permanent skill/buff) from an array of 3 options.  Once a card is selected, it will be applied to the skills of your current "run" or "playthrough" (all skills are reset upon a death event).

Remember to choose cards wisely, as the Skeletons will become progressively stronger with each level you clear!

Notes:

This game was created for the 2023 FFS Game Jam, and took approximately 150 hours to create (over the span of 30 days).

There are many features that I originally planned on adding prior to development (like more enemies, attacks, cards, and map-gen randomness), but unfortunately I simply ran out of time to implement them :(

Anyway, I hope you enjoy playing this quick and funny little game, and I can't wait to see what everyone else submitted to the jam!! :)
